description:
## Objective 
Remove the Hard-coded strings and add them to string resource file
## Description
1. Open Android Studio and Find out hard-coded text in XML file.
2. Convert them into String resource file.

####References 
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/34130513/how-to-solve-this-issue-of-hardcoded-string/34130992
https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource

##How to get help, be sure to post your questoin to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/
community/communications/#mailing-lists) or  ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos).
name: Mifos Wallet : Remove hard-coded strings in the app
